DescriptionData.Title: Loca Small Clown Wig - Green/White
DescriptionData.Description:
Fun 2-tone straight wig that can be worn up and spiky or down and shaggy like a silly boy. Fits small adult heads or children.
Before wearing, comb the wig out with a large-toothed comb. If desired back-comb (tease) or use ponytail holders or barrettes for a more interesting look Wigs should be stored on a wig stand and washed by hand (gently) with a mild shampoo.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Fun, spiky wig in neon orange and yellow
Medium size fits small adult heads or children
